attributes.action: NHS should help funding for laser hair removal
attributes.additional_details: I believe the NHS should help towards the costs of laser hair removal treatment for patients who are hugely affected. They help cover other cosmetic surgery for insecure people so why cant they help towards this treatment? This is the only treatment which is effective and works immediately but costs a huge price for someone's happiness. Hirsuitism is a unlucky diagnosis for people who get excess hair growth for no reason and is very common. From mild cases to really obscene cases of hair.

rejection.details: Please provide a clear statement on what action you want the government (not the NHS) to take.
